description: Izumiya Moe is http://anidb.net/ch26381 [Kazuki]`s younger sister. During summer holidays she works at the reception desk and by cleaning rooms of her family`s (?) inn when http://anidb.net/ch26383 [an interesting new customer] arrives whom she quickly takes kindly to, to the chagrin of her brother.
name: Izumiya Moe
